snippet: STUCKY--Steven. The Juilliard School deeply mourns the passing of faculty member Steven Stucky. Steven recently joined the composition faculty in September 2014 and immediately had a profoundly positive impact on the entire institution. With great integrity and creativity, he brought an extraordinary energy to all that he addressed. His legacy will live on through his students and his many important compositions. We extend our condolences to his wife, Kristen, and his children, Matthew and Maura, and his many friends. Joseph W. Polisi, President Ara Guzelimian, Provost and Dean Robert Beaser, Chair, Juilliard Composition Department 1/3
